  • r2dii

Dataset to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes

Source: R/classification_bridge.R
nace_classification.Rd

These dataset serve as a translation key between common sector-classification systems and sectors relevant to the 'PACTA' tool (https://2degrees-investing.org/resource/pacta/).

nace_classification

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 929 rows and 5 columns.

Definitions

  • borderline (logical): Flag indicating if 2dii sector and classification code are a borderline match.

  • code (double): Formatted NACE code removing periods.

  • code_level (double): Level of granularity of NACE code.

  • original_code (double): Original NACE code.

  • sector (character): Associated 2dii sector.

Details

Classification datasets help to standardize sector classification codes from the wild to a relevant subset including 'power', 'oil and gas', 'coal', 'automotive', 'aviation', 'concrete', 'steel', and 'shipping'.

See also

data_dictionary.

Other datasets for bridging sector classification codes: isic_classification, naics_classification, sector_classifications

Examples

head(nace_classification)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 5
#>   original_code  code code_level sector   borderline
#>           <dbl> <dbl>      <dbl> <chr>    <lgl>     
#> 1          30.1   301          3 shipping TRUE      
#> 2          30.1  3011          4 shipping TRUE      
#> 3          30.1  3012          4 shipping TRUE      
#> 4          33.2  3315          4 shipping TRUE      
#> 5          50      50          2 shipping TRUE      
#> 6          50.1   501          4 shipping TRUE
